virtualzoo.driver

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • virtualzoo.driver.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Class zoo memiliki atribut matriks Cell dimana 1 cell merepresentasikan sebuah petak 1x1m
    Version:
    1.0, March 2017
    Author:
    David Theosaksomo/13515131
